comments: This is the worst professor I ever had! I got an A in this class, but even so, she still found a way to bring me down and make me feel incompetent! I learned absolutely nothing in this class! DON\'T TAKE HER!
Very nice lady but not always clear on what she wants. Seems to make things overly complicated. Inconsistent with her grading.

Dr. Harris is a sweet lady but when it comes to assignments she is not clear on what she wants and she grades extremely hard. I am in honors and I had a tough time with the papers she would assign. Nothing is good enough for her! She gives feedback but way to much. If make an A she still critiques you and makes you feel incompetent.
Dr. Harris is very familiar with her subject matter and is a wealth of information. I\'m glad I took this class.

I loved this teacher and class. It only met four times, so most of our work was online. Dr Harris was GREAT about replying to any questions I had and was always very helpful. This class was a LOT of work, but Dr Harris was wonderful and made a class that could have been impossible nearly easy.
